articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Earth's magnetic field has helped put water on the Moon - study finds 'unexpected' process - Daily Express
articles.description: EARTH'S magnetic field can carry water to the Moon by seeding the lunar surface with ionised particles of hydrogen and oxygen that can spontaneously turn into H20, groundbreaking new research has proposed.
